availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Cann (Hart County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Hart County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Cann. Married to Margaret F. Calhoon Cann in Green County, Kentucky, on January 15, 1857. Father of Willia J. Cann, James M. Cann, and William A. Cann. Farmer in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Hart County in 1857. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 196B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Keysburg, p. 450A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Marriages.
